title: Elmo Saves Christmas
description: What would the world be like if every day was Christmas? Based on the best-selling video Elmo Saves Christmas, this PicturebackÂ®; is filled with big, bright illustrations and lots of fun and cheer. Children will enjoy the holiday spirit as they learn, along with Elmo, why Christmas is best when we save it for that one special time of the year!
author: Ellen Appleby
